Head: Dull occipital and frontal headache in afternoon
Pupils dilated with headache
Dull sensation over eyes
Eyeballs hot and hurt when moved
Extremities: Very tired and sore in lower limbs

details: Primary action is to increase the elimination of Indican. Auto-intoxication. Compare: SKATOL.Persistent desire to sleep, dull, discontented mental state, hideous delusions and nervousness, constant motion of fingers and feet. Intestinal putrefaction.
Common names: product of Putrefaction of Proteids)(A Crystalline Compound Derivable from Indigo, but also a
name: Indolum
